p: Dynamics of mosquito-to-human transmission probability was modeled using the 3-parameter equation ( Eq 1) described above. For each individual mosquito, values for the three parameters were drawn from a probability distribution ( S1 Table). M was drawn from a normal probability distribution, B was drawn from a truncated normal distribution (to avoid values <0) and K was drawn from a beta distribution. Alternative modeling strategies are described in S1 File.
